Producer: Guillaume de la Boulaye, Patrick Mao Huang, Gabriele Kranzelbinder, André Logie, Barbara Pichler
Production Co: Flash Forward Entertainment, KGP Filmproduktion, La Compagnie Cinématographique, Panache Productions, ZORBA production
Synopsis: Fei makes a living in the big city working as a hustler. His world collapses when he realizes that his family accepts his money but not his homosexuality. Broken-hearted, Fei struggles to create a new beginning in his life.
Title: Moneyboys
